**As a** User  
 **I need** to be able to remove a counter 
 **So that** if we don't longer need it we can remove ir 
   
 ### Details and Assumptions
 * [document what you know]
   
 ### Acceptance Criteria  
   
 ```gherkin
 Given [some context]
 When [certain action is taken]
 Then [the outcome of action is observed]
 ```
